name: The Shovel
description:
Made for the weekly game jam 180, with the theme of downgrade.
This shovel is too powerful! Can you wield it and downgrade it to safe standards?

Navigate using a/d for horizontal movement and w or space to jump. Slide down walls, jump around, and try to avoid destroying everything with your unwieldy shovel as you gather resources to make a better - I mean, worse one.

Your first shovel will destroy everything it touches as it follows your mouse. Later shovels will only destroy things you click on.

The music in the game is made by James Hammond!
